```py
>>> lst = ['a', 'a', 'b']
>>> ser = pd.Series([1, 2, 3], index=lst)
>>> ser
a    1
a    2
b    3
dtype: int64
>>> ser.groupby(level=0).get_group("a")
a    1
a    2
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> data = [[1, 2, 3], [1, 5, 6], [7, 8, 9]]
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["a", "b", "c"],
...                   index=["owl", "toucan", "eagle"])
>>> df
 a  b  c
owl     1  2  3
toucan  1  5  6
eagle   7  8  9
>>> df.groupby(by=["a"]).get_group((1,))
 a  b  c
owl     1  2  3
toucan  1  5  6 
```
